news.Title: [AI Summary] 精材11月營收年增逾13% 股價持平
news.Content: • 精材11月合併營收為6.75億元，年增13.67%，顯示營運成長動能 [1]。, • 精材近期股價持平，過去一週股價變動幅度為3.44%。 【綜合分析】 參考來源：Yahoo奇摩股市: 1則 | 資料期間：2025-12-10 至 2025-12-10 | 新聞數量：1 則 精材 (3374) 於2025年12月10日公布了11月份的營運數據，公司合併營收達到6.75億元，相較於去年同期成長了13.67%，此營收表現顯示公司在市場上維持穩健的成長步伐。此營收數據的公布，為市場提供了關注公司營運狀況的重要指標。 從股價表現來看，精材在2025年12月26日的最新收盤價為135.50元，與前一日收盤價持平，單日漲跌幅為0.00%。進一步觀察，近一週的股價變動幅度為3.44%，顯示在近期並未出現顯著的股價波動。雖然11月營收呈現年增長，但市場對此消息的反應尚未完全顯現在股價上，可能受到整體市場氛圍或投資人對未來展望的綜合評估影響。分析師將持續關注精材在後續月份的營收表現及相關產業動態，以評估其長期投資價值。截至目前為止，並無其他與公司營運重大相關的新聞報導出現。

news.Title: [AI Summary] Xintec November Revenue Up 13.67% YoY, Stock Price Flat
news.Content: • Xintec's November consolidated revenue reached NT$675 million, a year-on-year increase of 13.67%, indicating operational growth momentum [1]. • Xintec's stock price has remained flat recently, with a weekly price change of 3.44%. [Analysis] Sources: Yahoo Finance: 1 article | Period: 2025-12-10 to 2025-12-10 | Number of articles: 1 Xintec (3374) announced its November operational data on December 10, 2025. The company's consolidated revenue reached NT$675 million, marking a year-on-year increase of 13.67%. This revenue performance indicates that the company is maintaining a stable growth pace in the market. The release of this revenue figure provides an important indicator for the market to monitor the company's operational status. In terms of stock performance, Xintec's latest closing price on December 26, 2025, was NT$135.50, which was flat compared to the previous day's closing price, with a single-day change of 0.00%. Further observation reveals that the stock price has fluctuated by 3.44% over the past week, indicating no significant price volatility recently. Although the November revenue showed year-on-year growth, the market's reaction to this news has not yet been fully reflected in the stock price, possibly due to the overall market sentiment or investors' comprehensive assessment of future prospects. Analysts will continue to monitor Xintec's revenue performance in subsequent months and related industry dynamics to evaluate its long-term investment value. As of now, no other significant news related to the company's operations has been reported.
